message: This is a far step but ideally I would have some sort of plugin on firefox where the downloaded pic from my professional image stock would automatically be uploaded (tagged, named, etc) to my hosted django app.
has anyone had experience with it? anyone know of any tutorials/examples sites?
I would like to build an app where I can upload and tag images and, in the future, be able to search them.
basically, I'm looking for a in-house solution for searching the images I have already downloaded from the stock image website.
@gcmartinelli photologue's changed a bit over time. You could take a look at pinax's photos app for some guidance on how it can be used. https://github.com/pinax/pinax/tree/master/pinax/apps/photos
